title: AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'do_handshake'
body:
```
[2021-07-15T15:30:29.303411] 127.0.0.1:57806: mitmproxy has crashed!
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/proxy/server.py", line 279, in server_event
    for command in layer_commands:
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/proxy/layer.py", line 168, in handle_event
    command = next(command_generator)
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/proxy/layer.py", line 255, in handle_event
    yield from self._handle(event)
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/proxy/layer.py", line 168, in handle_event
    command = next(command_generator)
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/proxy/layers/http/__init__.py", line 690, in _handle_event
    yield from self.event_to_child(stream, event)
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/proxy/layers/http/__init__.py", line 740, in event_to_child
    for command in child.handle_event(event):
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/proxy/layer.py", line 168, in handle_event
    command = next(command_generator)
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/proxy/layers/http/__init__.py", line 608, in passthrough
    for command in self.child_layer.handle_event(event):
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/proxy/layer.py", line 168, in handle_event
    command = next(command_generator)
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/proxy/tunnel.py", line 85, in _handle_event
    yield from self.event_to_child(event)
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/proxy/layers/tls.py", line 315, in event_to_child
    for command in super().event_to_child(event):
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/proxy/tunnel.py", line 124, in event_to_child
    yield from self.start_handshake()
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/proxy/layers/tls.py", line 311, in start_handshake
    yield from self.receive_handshake_data(b"")
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/proxy/layers/tls.py", line 192, in receive_handshake_data
    self.tls.do_handshake()
AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'do_handshake'
```
